Room.Name: Eastern Hall
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the eastern hall of the great palace of Keslar.
Room.LongDescription: The eastern hall brings you from the front of the palace to the rear. At the southern end, another hallway has formed which appears to take you towards the main dining hall. The Keslar palace has long been entertaining the most powerful people of the land in order to influence their decisions over power in this region.
